GSP29nvtp1_2u:5: sa ca parārtho 'pi pṛcchopakramapratiyoginyekavaktṛke vicāre vivicya pravarttanīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:7: nyāyasya dūṣaṇopakramapratiyoginī tu nānāpravaktṛke kathānāmni kriyāvyatihāre pravartyaṃ vivecanīyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:10: dvitīyāhnikārthastu pravartanavivecana upālambhaparapadārthalakṣaṇamiti yukta idānīṃ tasyārambhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:11: tatrāpi pravartyavivecanīyadvāreṇa pravṛttiprakāratvācca kathāyāḥ prathamaṃ kathāprakaraṇamārabhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:14: anyathā hi vādādilakṣaṇasya pūrvāparaprakaraṇāpraveśāt āhnikāpraveśe śāstrabahirbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:15: atha sūtrakṛtaiva kathā kathaṃ sākṣāt noddiṣṭa,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:17: tad yathā caturṣu pramaiva vivakṣitaṃ phalamiti pramāṇatvena,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:23: tāni ca na kathāmātrasādhyānīti viśeṣata evoddeśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:24: tatra yaugikaṃ kathāśabdamupādāyānavasaradusthatayā bhāṣyam ākṣipya vārttikena samādhatte---tadayuktamityādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:26: api tu satyeva tasmin rūḍhiniyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:29: sa ca na kathāyā āśrayaḥ kiṃ tu viṣaya ityata āha---vicāraviṣayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:35: te dve api tisra eveti niyamayatā nirākṛte /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:41: yadi tu pratipakṣasādhanamanirūpyaiva vijigīṣuvitaṇḍāvat tāvataiva vādinau kṛtinau,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:54: nanvetāvatāpi na sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāvitamityata āha---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:61: tathā ca svasthaḥ sarvañjanapratyayānapalāpī matamātrāvalambī avahito 'kalahakāraśceti kathādhikāriṇo darśitāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:65: te 'pi prakṛtoktiko 'vipralambhako yathākālasphūrtikaḥ anākṣepako yuktisiddhasaṃpratyayī ceti pañca vāde upādeyāḥ viparyayeṇa heyāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:66: evaṃ bhūtāśca viṣyādaya eva prāyeṇeti ta evoktāḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:67: evaṃ ca sati heyān vihāya yo yathābhūtaḥ sa tathābhūtena vaktumarhati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:69: na hi yuyutsuriraṃsū pratipadya ciraṃ asiddhaṃ saṃbhūya samīhitaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:83: tadgatākṣepastu uddeśa eva pramāṇatarkaśabdasya sādhanopālambhaśabdavat svavācakalakṣaṇayā vā,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:96: yat karmatvadaśāyāṃ śabdāderanityatvaṃ dharmo karmakaraṇayorapi karmaiva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:100: anyathā tu viṣayaḥ śaktiviṣayaḥ śakyaṃ kāryamiti yāvadityevamapi sugamametat /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:101: atra hi jalpe nigrahasthānaviniyogādityādibhāṣye na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:102: itivad vāde sarvanigrahasthānapratiṣedhe agnīṣomīyaṃ paśumālabheta itivat siddhāntāviruddha ityādiviśeṣavidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:104_1: pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyāḥ itivat parisaṃkhyānārthamuttarapadārambha iti vyākhyātavān /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:109: upālambhapadena nirāśaṅkameva pratipāditatvāt ityata āha---niyamaḥ parisaṃkhyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:112: tatra cānyatra ca prāptau parisaṃkhyeti kīrtyate //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:120: pratijñāntaraṃ hetvantaramajñānamapratibhā vikṣepo matānujñā paryanuyojyopekṣaṇamiti saptakam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:130: hetvābhāsānudbhāvane niranuyojyānuyogānudbhāvane ca pāramparyavyāghāto vyāsaṅgādīnā tatsāmagrīpratirodhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:141: apasiddhānte saṃmukhapramāṇabādhākrāntiriti ākāṅkṣāyogyatāsattimattayā pratisaṃhitaṃ pramāṇāntarāpratihataṃ ca vākyaṃ tattvapratipatteraṅgam, nānyathā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:143: tadetat sarvamabhiprāyaṃ niyamayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmataṃ sūtrādeva ca labhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:145: na tu niyamaḥ kṛta iti vyājena darśayati---tathā ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:149: tathāpyasmin pakṣe kimasya prayojanamityata āha---sādhanopālambhaviśeṣaṇāya ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:154: stheyānāṃ tu vādasthānakathāviśeṣavyavasthāpanaṃ pūrvottaravādasthāpanaṃ vivadamānayorguṇadoṣāvadhāraṇaṃ bhagnaprativādiprabodhanaṃ loke niṣpannakathāphalapratipādanaṃ ca karmāṇi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:155: etadarthaṃ ca tatra prāśnikopayogo yad vādinau kāraṇagraheṇa evaṃ kartumaśaktau /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:157: tatra tayoreva vītarāgatayā śaktatvādityāśayavānāha---na vāde prāśnikānāmiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:171: na dūṣitaṃ cet---uttarābhāsavacanena cāvacanena ca nigṛhītastarhi dvitīyo,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:175: yathā hi vāde svasādhanasthitau parasādhananivṛttau ca tattvanirṇayo na viparyaye,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:176: tathā jalpe 'pi svasādhanasthitau parasādhananivṛttau ca vijayo viparyaye bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:178_0: tadayaṃ jalprapavṛttikramaḥ vādini sādhanamātraṃ prayujya saṃkṣepato vistarato vā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:178_1: ābhāsān uddhṛtya virate sati ucyamānagrāhyanigrahāprāptau ābhāsabahiruktagrāhyanigrahālābhe
GSP29nvtp1_2u:181: tasminnapyevaṃ virate sati anuktocyamānagrāhyanigrahālābhe tadvavacanamavagamyānūdya dūṣaṇāṅgaṃ prati dūṣyābhāsabahiruktagrāhyanigrahālābheda prathamavādī sthāpanāṃśaṃ dūṣayet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:185: śarasandhānasamaya eva yo mūrcchitaḥ tadvāṇavāraṇatatpraharaṇānuṣṭhānavad viphalatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:192: yadyapi nigrahasthānapadenāviśeṣāt sarvaprāptau siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapanna iti padadvayātideśo mandaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:193: tathāpi gorbalīvardanyāyenāpi yathāśrutabhāṣyopapattau kṛtaṃ tadbhāṅgeneti manyamāno bhāṣyaṃ vārttikena samañjasayannāha---uktamātramityādi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:201: pareṇa sādhusādhanopādāne ca kṛta ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:222: vādinorabhiprāyavaśādanuvidheyastheyānurodhāt veti na kiñcidetat dvitīyasādhanapraveśasatu dūṣaṇatayā na pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:238: tatra sādhanavādinā prathamatastadābhāsaparihāre dūṣaṇavādināpi saduttaraparigrahe yatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:239: saduttarālābhe hi asaduttarāvatāra iti śikṣārthaṃ hetvābhāsāḥ prathamaṃ chalādibhya uddiṣṭā iti saiva saṃgatirihāpītyāha---uddeśeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:240_0: atra triṣoḍaśyāṃ vyāpakāvyāpakabhedena yā dviṣoḍaśī sā asiddhaviśeṣaṇāsiddhaviśeṣyā
GSP29nvtp1_2u:250: atraiva punarāśrayāsiddhiṃ prakṣipyāparaṃ dvānavataṃ śatam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:285: nanu vibhāgasūtre savyabhicāra ityuddiṣṭaṃ padamiha māṣyakāro lakṣaṇatvenaiva vyācaṣṭe /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:288: tathāpi lakṣaṇe vaktavye padaniruktiḥ kvopayujyate ityata āha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:289: kiṃ tvekasminnante yo niyata iti anvayato vyatirekato vā sādhyenaiva sahacarito dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:298: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ sarvo 'yamityādi vārtikamityata āha---avagatam iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:303: na tatrāyamanvayato vyatirekato vā niyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:312: tatra sarvasya vā kasyacid vā yo dharmo hetutayopātta ubhāvantau sādhyadharmatadviparyayau āśritya prasajya pravartate dharmiṇi so 'naikāntika iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:314: vyatirekiṇyeva hi dharme sādhye 'naikāntikaḥ saṃbhavatprayogo na tvavyatirekiṇi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:316: tat kathaṃ tatpratiṣedha ityata āha---paryudāsapakṣa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:318: na hi goghaṭādāvabrāhmaṇa iti vaktāro bhavanti,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:327: tayoḥ satorayaṃ vā mīmāṃsakābhimato viśeṣavirodho 'pi viruddha syādityapi /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:329: siddhāntaśabdenātra pakṣo vivakṣito 'to na prakṛtahānaṃ nāpyapasiddhāntavaiyarthyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:333: na ca viśeṣaḥ pratijñāyate 'pi tu abhipreyate na ca tathābhūtena virodhopalambhasaṃbhavo 'siddhidaśāyāmanupambhena siddhidaśāyāṃ sahopalambhenānavasaraparāhatatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:335: svārthānumānasamaye prakṛtopapādakatayā tatsiddheḥ anupapādakastu viśeṣo na sidhyati /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:337: tadāpi kathaṃ sarvathānupalabdhacaraḥ sidhyatītyapi na vācyam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:342: syādetat, virodhe hi heturna syāt sādhya vā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:346: anyatarāniścaye 'pi sandigdhāsiddha ityāśakṅkyoktaṃ vārttikakṛtā yasmādamyupagataṃ bādhata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:350: kiṃ tvayameva sisādhayipitaṃ bādhata iti vārttikārthaḥ sugama eva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:383: iha khalu hetvābhāsānāṃ tattyānusaṃhitānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ saṃśayo vivakṣitaviparītajñānaṃ jijñāsā ajñānaṃ vyāptibādhaśceti phalāni /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:386: yasmāt prakriyamāṇārthajijñāsāmātraṃ bhavati sa prakarasama iti saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:394: tasmādekāṃ koṭimupanayan samabalena pratiruddhaḥ kathamatra nirṇayo bhavatviti jijñāsāṃ janayan prakaraṇasama itarebhyo bhidyata iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:401: tathāpi saṃśayānuvṛttinivṛttyoḥ jijñāsānuvṛttinivṛttī iti mattvoktam---tatra sandigdhe tadvā jijñāsate iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:402: nanu yata eva jijñāsā kathaṃ tameva prekṣāvān tattvanirṇayāya prayokṣyata ityata āha---vicitrābhisandhitayeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:403: pūrvasamayo duṣpratyayo jātu prayojyabuddhiriti hi sādhanottarābhāsaprayoge hetava ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:405: nanu vyutpattimāśritya cet prakaraṇasamapadaṃ pravartate kṛtaṃ tarhi yasmādityādilakṣaṇāntareṇetyata āha---vyutpattīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:406: athaitadeva pravṛttinimittaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha---anyatheti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:407: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa savyabhicārāt prakaraṇasamaṃ bhedayatā tasya saṃśayahetutvamasya ca prakaraṇapravṛttihetutvamuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:411: na hi yasmāt prakaraṇamiti sūtramapi tu yasmāt prakaraṇacinteti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:421: na hi nityadharmopalabdhyā śabde kadācidapi na bhavitavyam iti pramāṇamasti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:422: tathā cāsiddhatvaṃ vihāya kutaḥ prakaraṇasamatvamudbhāvayatītyata āha---na ca tattvānupalabdhiriti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:426: yastūpalambhābhāvena sulabhāmanupalabdhiṃ matvā viśeṣamapratisandhāya pratibalena ca pratibandhamupanyasyati,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:427: taṃ prati kimayamābhāsatāṃ yātu na vā?
GSP29nvtp1_2u:443: ekasmin pakṣe ubhayapadaṃ vihāyāparasmin vyāvṛttidvāreti padamadhyāhṛtya phakkikābodhaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:445: evaṃ jijñāsāhetutvābhāvāt prakaraṇasamalakṣaṇāyogitayā śarīrādanyatvaṃ na tadudāharaṇamityuktam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:450: nāgṛhyamāṇaviśeṣadaśāyāmanupalabdhyoranyayorvā dharmayoḥ kaścit viśeṣo gṛhyamāṇaviśeṣadaśāyāṃ tu yathānyasyānyatra hetvābhāse 'ntarbhāvaḥ tathānupalabdherapīti sāpi tyājyā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:463: asiddha ityasyāpi pakṣadharmatayā na niścita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:472: abhāvaniścayād veti na kaścit phalaṃ prati viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:473: etena vyomapadmāṃ sugandhi padmātvāt ityādayo 'pi saṃgṛhītā bhavanti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:475: yathā hi, asati sapakṣe vipakṣe ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartu na śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:489: svāśrayaṃ prāgdeśād vibhajya deśāntaraṃ prāpayat karma tattāyāṃ vyavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:502: guṇakarmaṇāṃ nirguṇatayā guṇasya tatra samavāyavirodhena tatsamavāye sāmānyarūpatvopapatterityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:504: hetuṃ sādhayati---na mana iti teṣāṃ viśeṣaguṇavirahāt sāmānyaguṇo 'yaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:511: tacca rūpitvaṃ gaganapavanābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaṃ cākṣuṣaguṇasaṃbandhamapi vyāvartayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:512: nāpi tejasaḥ tadguṇatvaṃ hi pratītau tadavirodhitvena vyāptam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:519: na tāvat chāyā tejaso rūpametadrūpasya śuklabhāsvaratvaniyamātṛ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:522: tathā ca cakṣuṣopalabhyamānaṃ na rūpamanantarbhāvyopalabdhuṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:535: na ca yatsahitasya yasya yatra sāmarthyaṃ tadrahitena tena tatkaraṇam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:538: etena pārthivaṃ rūpamāropitaṃ tama iti nirastam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:539: bāhyālokasahakārivirahe cakṣuṣastathārope 'pyasāmarthyāt tadeva hi dharmyantare vā samāropyeta pittapītimavat,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:540: tatraiva vā niyatadeśe 'vagamyamāne aniyatadeśatvamiti nedīyasyaṇīyasyapi mahattvavat /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:565: sa ca niṣedhyādanekadravyānnivartamānā svavyāpyaṃ sparśarahitatvaṃ gṛhītvā tadviparīte viśrāmyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:576: tasmād yadyārambhakasvabhāvatvaṃ manasastadā kadācidārambhe prayojanamapi kiñcid bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:580: pratyakṣabādhastu tadā syāt yadi tama evāpahnūyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:587: evaṃ tarhi raktādivyavahāro 'pi prasajyata iti cet---na,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:589: na tu nimittāmastītyeva vyavahāraḥ yathā śaṣayoḥ śavyavahāro gauḍānāṃ varṇatvanimittāviśeṣe 'pi na kādivyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:591: tat kiṃ na kiñcidevac chāyetyata āha---tasmād bhābhāva evac chāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:593: so 'pi kathamālokamantareṇa pratiyogismaraṇādhikaraṇagrahaṇavirahe vidhimukhena cākṣuṣo viṣaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:599: pratyuta virodha eva tasmin sati hi tadabhāva eva na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:600: kiṃ tatsāpekṣeṇa cakṣuṣā gṛhyeta divā ca pratiyoginaḥ prabhāmaṇḍalasya grahe eva pradeśāntare tadgrahaṇamiti na kiñcidanupapannam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:606: adhikaraṇam api dṛṣṭamanumitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā ihedānīmandhakāra iti pratyayāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:611: ihāpi mātsaryamapanīya eṣaiva rītiranugamyatāmiti suṣṭhūpasaṃhṛtam---tasmād bhābhāva evac chāyeti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:613: na tu deśāntaradarśanaprayuktam tacca prayojakamiha niścitavyāvṛtti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:614: tathā hi svātantrayeṇa deśāntaraprāptau vārakānuvidhānaniyamo na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:615: prabhātulyatve tejaḥprabhāśrayeṣu ratnaviśeṣeṣuc chāyā divase na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:616: chāyayaivābhibhave vā bahalatame tamasi teṣāmāloko na syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:626: tathāpi na tāvat svarūpata āśrayato vā tatrāsiddhirudbhāvayituṃ śakyate,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:630: yadi ca tena dūṣayituṃ na śakyate taddvārāpyapādhirevodbhāvyeta /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:635: astu tarhi savyabhicāravat aprayojako nāma ṣaṣṭho hetvābhāsaḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:645: vārttike satī chāyā gatimatī deśāntare darśanāditi viśeṣaṇadvārā āśrayāsiddhaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:647: tadetāvanta evāsiddhabhedā iti bhramanirāsārthamudāharati---ta eta iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:654: atra yathāśrutabhāṣyavārttikadarśanāt sarvamasamañjasamiti mattvā svavyākhyāṃ sthānāntarīyabhāṣyādyupanyāsena saṃvadannāha---atretyādinā /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:672: atha virodhasyaiva prathamaṃ buddhāvupanipātāt tadudbhāvanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatvasyodbhāvayitumaśakyatvācca so 'vaśyābhyupagantavyaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:678: athaitadudāharaṇaṃ svamate pañcakoṭiṣu kvāntarbhaviṣyatītyata āha---sa punariti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:688: atha sādhanavādī pramādī prativādī vā saduttarasamādhānayoraparisphūrtau tayorvijigīṣuḥ tadābhāsamapi brūyāditi tadābhāsavyutpādanāvasaraḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:689: tatrāpi jāteḥ svapakṣavyāghātāpādakatvena jaghanyatvāt chalasya tu tātparyato duṣṭatve 'pi vacanato 'duṣṭattvādasphūrtidaśāyāmapi tadeva prayoktavyam /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:690: tasyāpyasphūrtau jātiriti viśeṣajñāpanārthaṃ jāteḥ pūrvaṃ chaloddeśaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:693: arthavaicitryopapattyā vacanavighātasya jātāvapi saṃbhavādityata āha---yathā vakturiti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:694: iha vāgvṛttiviparyāsena pratyavasthānaṃ na tu tatreti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:695: nanu vibhāgo nodāhṛtaḥ tatkathaṃ vibhāge tūdāharaṇānīti bhāṣyamityata āha---vibhajyata iti // 10 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:698: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ vibhāgaśceti kṛtvā vibhāgasūtrameva paṭhatītyata āha---vibhajyate 'neneti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:708: tadyathā bhūbhṛdayaṃ vīryaśālī mahāvayavattvādityatra dharmipadasaṃcāreṇa na nakhaprasūnāñcitakarapallavo 'yaṃ nityakarmakaratvādityatra sādhyapadasaṃcāreṇa /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:721: tad yathā, anyathāsiddho 'siddhaśceti vyāghātaḥ kathamapi siddhatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:727: asya pratyavasthānamityādi bhāṣyaṃ na pūrvasūtravyākhyānaṃ nottarasūtraparaṃ vetyata āha---tadetacchalamiti // 1.2 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:736: kvacit tu hetutvoddeśaviśeṣaṇeṣu yathā brāhmaṇādupajāto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:738: tadetat sarvaṃ vivakṣitamāpnoti cātyeti cobhayasamānaṃ cetyatisāmānyamucyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:743: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādityukte dhaṭo 'pyanityaḥ tarhi kṛtakatvāt śabdaḥ syāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:744: tṛtīyaṃ tu, śataṃ dvijātayo bhojitā ityukte śatasaṃkhyāvacchinnā api bhojitāḥ sanakādayo na dvijātaya iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:749: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu, dvijaśataṃ bhojitamityukte dvijā bhojitāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:764: ye krośanti te dhvanihetavo yathā mañcāḥ,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:771: na ca heturasiddhatvādīnā dūṣyate api tu liṅgameva /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:772_0: ato niranuyojyānuyogo bhavata ityādi dharmavikalpanirdeśaśabdenābhidhānadharmo dvedhābhidhīyata
GSP29nvtp1_2u:772_1: iti vārttikaikavākyatām āpādayituṃ bhūmiṃ racayitvā yathāśrutabhāṣyamupekṣya khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ
GSP29nvtp1_2u:773: dyayapi neha sphuṭam tathāpyekatra vastusadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:780: tatra na tāvat pūrvā chalaparīkṣāsūtrāṇāṃ lakṣaṇasyādhyāyārthatvāt /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:790: chalaparīkṣājātyādilakṣaṇasūtrāṇāṃ prakṛtopayogyekakāryāyogena tannibandhanāya api saṃgaterabhāvādityata āha---parīkṣāparvaṇa iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:794: parīkṣitaṃ satsu vivacitaṃ sugrahaṃ supariharaṃ chalaṃ bhaviṣyatīti parīkṣāprayojanaṃ sphuṭīkṛtya pūrvapakṣamāha---yathā hīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:806: vārttikaṃ tu ekatra dharmaḥ pratiṣidhyate 'nyatra dharmīti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:808: na hyatra mañcā eva dharmiṇaḥ pratiṣidhyante /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:813: sarvavyāpakaṃ tu mukhyopacāravṛttyanugatatvena anayorbhedakau niyatau dharmāviti // 1.6 //
GSP29nvtp1_2u:823: tathāpi pratijñāhānyādernigrahasthānasyāpi tathābhāvāt tāṃ saṃgatimupekṣyārthadūṣaṇatvābhiprāyeṇa prayogasya sāmyāduttaraprakaraṇa evāntarbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:824: tatrāntarbhūtāyāśca jāteḥ pṛthakkaraṇe uddeśa eva prayojanamuktam,
GSP29nvtp1_2u:832: tasyāpi hetuto vaidharmyeṇa hetvābhāsasādharmyeṇa pratyavasthānarūpatvādityata āha---na ceti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:833: ayaṃ ca mātraśabdārtho jātīnāmavatāraṃ vāde pratiṣedhatā asaduttaratvakhyāpanenaiva sūtrakṛtā sūcitaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:841: aparāddho hi nigrahaṃ śāstiṃ khalīkāraṃ prāpnoti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:848: tena kathāyāṃ pravṛttayāṃ vādinoratattvajñānajñāpikā kriyā nigrahasthānamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:859: atha parājayaprāptireva kā ityata uktam---nigrahasthānaṃ pratijñāhānyādi khalu spaṣṭam parājayaprāptiriti bhāṣyaṃ sphuṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:869: prathamata eva vyatikramādityata āha---yathālakṣaṇaṃ yathāsvarūpamityartha iti /
GSP29nvtp1_2u:871: ārthyā vṛttyā prathamasūtrasya uddeśāntarbhāve 'pi dvitīyasūtramalagnakam asaṃgatikatvādityata āha---tasmāditi /
